education.content:
# Master’s Degree in Informatics Engineering

## Program Overview
A two-year program that provides advanced knowledge and expertise in computer science, software engineering, and related fields. The program includes core courses, electives, and a research project or thesis. It prepares students for leadership roles in industry or research.

# Bachelor’s Degree in Informatics Engineering

## Program Overview
This program emphasizes the development of students’ skills in functional and logical algorithms, as well as their understanding of basic mathematics for engineering. It also offers a brief overview of computer networks, artificial intelligence, and related topics, providing students with the opportunity to explore these fields further in their careers or in advanced studies. The degree aims to prepare students to design, develop, and maintain software systems and to analyze and solve problems in computer science and engineering.
